Picsum App


Android App which uses picsum API to get list of images and displays their filename to the user.
onclick respective image is downloaded in Picsum folder in background with support for parallel downloads.
Shows a notification with progress of the current download.

TrackMySleepQuality App


The App is implemented with MVVM Architecture. It demonstrates the use of Data Binding, Navigation, ViewModel, Livedata and Room library, which are part of Android Architecture Components.
